name: Dark Calm Demo (Kickstarter in details)
description:
A character driven turn-based RPG

Kickstarter: http://kck.st/2P1BXSq

Let me address the elephant in the room: Yes, this is an RPG Maker game. That's why I need your help. I've come up with a story and characters I'm passionate about. I will be working on the story, soundtrack, level design, and making the battle system more engaging. I'm raising money to pay artists to draw better character portraits, title screen, enemy sprites, and art for cutscenes. If I have enough I also want to have battle backgrounds and menus drawn and redesigned.
